page.not.found.error: Error 404: The requested URL was not found or is not available
name: Name
home.step.1: Install the "edge_integration_core" under "Available integrations" menu as well as the additional channels you would like to integrate with.
home.step.1.next: Click on the "Install avalilable integrations" button to access all available integrations. Install integrations that you require to complete this step.
home.step.2: Complete the integration and authorization prcoess for all your installed integrations.
home.step.2.next: Click on the "Connected integration" button to access the installed integration and complete the connection.
home.step.3: Select any subscription plan to unlock the full functionality of Ebanux! We offer different plans to cater to all business.
home.step.3.next: Click on the "Get subscription" button to access the subscription page to select a suitable plan.
home.step.4: Configure your integration workflows such as importing orders, products & inventory sync. You can select pre-made workflows or customise them to your business needs.
home.step.4.next: Click on the "Create workflows" button to configure all the necessary integration workflows.
